# How to Find Sponsorship Opportunities

> ## Documentation Index
> Fetch the complete documentation index at: https://howtofindsponsorshipopportunities.com/llms.txt
> Use this file to discover all available pages before exploring further.

## Quick Answer

Find sponsorships by building a media kit with audience demographics, identifying brands that sponsor similar creators, and pitching via personalized cold email. Even micro-influencers (1K+ followers) can land $500–5,000 deals.

---

# How to Find Sponsorship Opportunities

Find sponsorships by building a **media kit** with audience demographics, identifying brands that sponsor similar creators, and pitching via **personalized cold email**. Even micro-influencers (1K+ followers) can land $500–5,000 deals.

## Sponsorship Rates by Follower Count

| Followers | Typical Rate | Platform |
|-----------|--------------|----------|
| 1K-10K | $100-500 | Instagram, TikTok |
| 10K-50K | $500-2,000 | All platforms |
| 50K-100K | $2,000-5,000 | All platforms |
| 100K-500K | $5,000-20,000 | All platforms |
| 500K+ | $20,000+ | Negotiated |

## Finding Sponsors

1. **Analyze competitors** — who sponsors similar creators?
2. **Use sponsor databases** — platforms like Sponsorgap, Grin
3. **Direct outreach** — cold email marketing teams
4. **Inbound applications** — list yourself on marketplaces

---

## Blog Posts

### How to Find Sponsorship Opportunities: The Complete Guide for 2026
URL: https://howtofindsponsorshipopportunities.com/blog/find-sponsorship-opportunities-guide/

Methods: sponsor marketplaces, competitor analysis, direct outreach. Rates by follower count. Pitch templates included.

---

### How to Build a Sponsorship Media Kit That Lands Deals
URL: https://howtofindsponsorshipopportunities.com/blog/sponsorship-media-kit-guide/

Media kit essentials: audience demographics, engagement metrics, rate card, case studies. Template and examples.

---

### How to Cold Email Brands for Sponsorships (With Templates)
URL: https://howtofindsponsorshipopportunities.com/blog/cold-email-sponsorship-pitch/

Cold email framework for sponsorship pitches. Subject lines, pitch structure, follow-up sequences. Real examples that closed deals.

---

## Tools

### Sponsorship Rate Calculator
URL: https://howtofindsponsorshipopportunities.com/tools/sponsorship-rate-calculator/

Calculate sponsorship rate based on audience size, engagement rate, platform.

---

### Media Kit Builder
URL: https://howtofindsponsorshipopportunities.com/tools/media-kit-builder/

Build professional sponsorship media kit with audience data, rates, past partnerships.

---

### Brand Pitch Email Generator
URL: https://howtofindsponsorshipopportunities.com/tools/brand-pitch-generator/

Generate personalized sponsorship pitch emails based on brand and creator profile.
